messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/20/02 8:58:37 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Well, then you are automatically absolved!  Post more, and ignore the mistakes. We all
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/20/02 8:58:37 AM Central Daylight Time,
homemama@... writes:


> I get embarrassed when I read my post and I've
> missed something. It's another reason I don't post often. Guess I shouldn't
> read my posts. LOL!
>
> Barb E

Well, then you are automatically absolved! <beg> Post more, and ignore the
mistakes. We all make them.
~Nancy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] spell check
messages.msgSnippet: Nancy, I have a Mac and I don t use the website often. Thanks for trying. I guess it doesn t matter but I get embarrassed when I read my post and I ve missed
messages.messageBody:
Nancy,
I have a Mac and I don't use the website often. Thanks for trying. I
guess it doesn't matter but I get embarrassed when I read my post and I've
missed something. It's another reason I don't post often. Guess I shouldn't
read my posts. LOL!

Barb E

on 10/20/02 2:38 AM, Dnowens@... at Dnowens@... wrote:

> In a message dated 10/18/02 11:57:33 PM Central Daylight Time,
> homemama@... writes:
>
>
>> Barb E
>> Wish I had spell check. I don't catch them all.
>>
> Can you right click on your mouse and get a window to pop up? If so,
> somewhere on the window there might be a spell check option. Otherwise ...
> does it matter? <g>
> ~Nancy
